review_data.title: used to eat here a lot
review_data.content: Very nice location, especially during a sunny day. The ambience is perfect! The food is not bad, no sensational dishes though. The quality is good. Try to reserve on a nice summer evening!

review_data.title: Good service, decent food
review_data.content: Went here for a business lunch. The restaurant itself is very plain and offers decent food. For lunch they offer a few daily menus and also have a decent variety of à la carte choices. The service was quite good and very friendly.
